channel.title: what cardinal said
channel.description: Where legal discourse meets aesthetic theory and absurdist thought

item.title: Law for Whom
item.description: The production of disposable populations. Selective legality, structural violence, and sacrificial strata.

item.title: Trade-Based Money Laundering
item.description: India's stance on TBML, the limitations of PMLA, and why $159 billion flows through the shadows of global commerce annually.

item.title: Haircut vs. Time
item.description: A cost-benefit analysis under the Indian Insolvency & Bankruptcy Code. Why a lower headline haircut might not be worth the time.

item.title: That is Law
item.description: Examining law as a tool, its malleability, and the hidden mechanisms that shape legal outcomes.

item.title: Prologue
item.description: An introduction to the philosophy behind this blog and the figures who shaped this perspective.
